courses.title: Mysterious World
courses.description: Explore a Next.js-powered mysterious world filled with interactive animations and engaging content. Learn React concepts, server-side rendering, and dynamic routing while creating an immersive web experience.

courses.title: BookStore App
courses.description: Build a modern, fully functional bookstore app using the latest web technologies. Learn to handle product listings, cart management, and a seamless user experience.

courses.title: Codepen Editor
courses.description: Master the Codepen editor to create, test, and share your code with ease. Explore advanced features to enhance your web development skills.

courses.title: Weather App
courses.description: Create your very own weather application with real-time data. Learn how to use APIs to fetch and display dynamic weather information.

courses.title: Unit Converter
courses.description: A Unit Converter project using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It offers a simple interface for converting length, weight, and temperature units with a clean and responsive design.

courses.title: Real-Time Digital Clock
courses.description: Develop a real-time digital clock using modern JavaScript techniques. Perfect your skills in time handling and dynamic rendering.
